channel.title: School ; Like it or not?
channel.description: I'd say 10 Because school is important and improves your education. So when your older your income can be more, thereforth living a good life usally after retirement with all the money earned from the great job due to school studies.

item.title: School ; Like it or not?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

You guys gotta realize that theories are basically the truth. Evolution happened. The Big Bang or something very similar happened. There really isn’t much room for debate, and if there is, it is about how it happened, rather than if it happened.

I’ve never heard about the ‘drug theory,’ but I can’t say I agree with that. It’s only made by big tobacco companies who are losing money to people buying pot instead of cigs.

Read full topic

item.title: School ; Like it or not?
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

rabcarl:

0. It’s shit. The teachers act like they know everything, but I’m just sitting in the back wondering where they came up with this bullshit. My teachers are all hippie athiests that like to pretend the world is perfect and give a 1-sided view of life. The part that pisses me off the most is that they say things like it’s the absolute truth when they’re talking about one of their bullshit opinions or a theory they made up. It’s even more sickening that the other kids buy into their bullshit while I’m the only one it seems who has the ability to see through their shit to the truth.

That’s why you go to college. They will teach you to use your own brain over there.

[quote=“MastrChief, post:37, topic:125287”][quote author=rabcarl link=topic=175496.msg1640464#msg1640464 date=1185884490]
The part that pisses me off the most is that they say things like it’s the absolute truth when they’re talking about one of their bullshit opinions or a theory they made up. It’s even more sickening that the other kids buy into their bullshit while I’m the only one it seems who has the ability to see through their shit to the truth.
[/quote]

Like 2+2=22?[/quote]
No, more like “Drugs are bad. Period, end of discussion”.

I’d vote for 5. School is getting better every year. I wouldn’t say this if I hadn’t worked my ass off for the past few months in this huge storehouse 20 miles away from where I live.

Read full topic
